meanings.definition: A shard of pottery used in ancient Greece for voting.
meanings.sent1: The ostraka was a small piece of pottery.
meanings.sent2: The ancient Greeks used ostraka for voting purposes.
meanings.sent3: The ostraka shard decided the fate of the city council election.
meanings.sent4: The broken ostraka symbolized the power of democracy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ostraka made the voting process more engaging.

meanings.definition: Plural form of ostrakon, a piece of pottery used for writing.
meanings.sent1: Many ostraka were found with inscriptions from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists discovered a collection of ostraka in the ruins.
meanings.sent3: The ostraka pieces told stories of long-forgotten events.
meanings.sent4: The pile of ostraka resembled a library of ancient knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The delicate ostraka held secrets of the past within their clay.
